resources.string:
Use the Settings menu to change the display theme. 

USAGE
You can toggle between light and dark themes for both the main displays and the dialog windows. Notice that this textfield is wrapped in a scroll view, so should scroll if there is too much text to fit in the window. 

VERSION
This example requires Android API 15 or above.
This App demonstrates how to create Themes with compound attributes and how to change the Theme at runtime and store the current theme in shared preferences. It requires Android API 19 or above.
A description of Task 1 will go in this field.
A description of Task 2 will go in this field.
